eventItems.name: NEW SUMMER CELEBRATION MENUS
eventItems.description: Throw a private event with us before September 29, and wow both your guests and your wallet with our new multi-course Summer Celebration Menus. Whether you're all about dinner or lunch, we've got you covered—because who says you can’t impress on a budget?

eventItems.name: PRIVATE HOLIDAY
eventItems.description: Elevate your corporate holiday party or private event to pure elegance in one of our stunning private dining rooms! Dazzle your guests with festive decorations, mouthwatering prime steaks, and exclusive holiday lunch and dinner menus. Want to go big? You can even book the entire restaurant for an unforgettable experience!

eventItems.name: WEDDING-RELATED EVENTS & CATERING
eventItems.description: Whether it's your bridal shower or the big reception, let us help you create a wedding event that’s unforgettable, day or night. Host in one of our private dining rooms with a wedding package, or choose catering, and we'll deliver the celebration to your location of choice.

additional_stories.name: Josper History
additional_stories.description: The idea belongs to a Spanish company - manufacturer 'Josper' created in 1970 by Pere Juli and Josep Armangue. It was an enclosed charcoal oven where food was cooked at high temperatures. The oven combined the functions of a charcoal grill and a barbecue and the dishes cooked in it remained juicy and fragrant.

eventItems.name: MILESTONE CELEBRATION
eventItems.description: Make your milestone birthday, anniversary, or retirement party truly special by celebrating in our vibrant private event spaces

eventItems.name: GRADUATION EVENTS & CATERING
eventItems.description: Toast your graduate’s hard work with friends, family, and classmates in one of our private dining spaces, or take the celebration anywhere with our group catering options!
